name: TrackMyExpenses
0:
”Alexa, launch track my expenses”
”Alexa, tell track my expenses I spent thirty rupees on vegetables today”
”Alexa, ask track my expenses how much I spent today”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: track my expenses
des:
Track My Expenses can be used to record and analyse your expenses every day, month or year. Make a note of your expenses each day and let track my expenses tell you how much you're spending on a specific item per month or per year. This can help you identify where expenses can be reduced and thus, where money can be saved. 

Users have to set their preferred currency the first time they use the app and never bother with the currency format again. You are given the flexibility to add expenses to a previous day, month, or year, or any date in fact. Similarly, you can review expenses for any day. You can also ask how much you spent on a specific item for a given month.

This will make it easier to keep track of your expenses and help you start spending wisely.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
